abstract: Ligaya Mishan reviews Grandchamps restaurant in Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: The chef, Shawn Brockman, has been trusted with his mother-in-law’s recipes, which may explain the generous, maternal quality of his dishes.

headline.main: Grandchamps Welcomes You to Haiti, via Bedford-Stuyvesant

snippet: The chef, Shawn Brockman, has been trusted with his mother-in-law’s recipes, which may explain the generous, maternal quality of his dishes.
